name: essay1
text: How long have you known the applicant?

name: essay2
text: In what capacity have you known the applicant?

name: essay3
text: If the applicant was a student in some of your classes, what were these subjects?

name: essay4
text: What do you  consider as the applicant's outstanding talents or strengths in realtion to gradute study?

name: essay5
text: What do you consider as his/her weakness or deficiencies in relation to graduate study?

name: instructions
text: Please rate the applicant on the following characteristics in comparison with other students in the same disciplines who are known to you and who have had more or less the same amount of training and experience.  Indicate size of the group with which applicant is being compared and its educational level.

name: groupSize
text: Group Size

name: educLevel
text: Educational Level

name: question1
text: Intelectual ability

text: Academic preparation for proposed field of study

name: question3
text: Motivation for proposed field of study

text: Originality, creativity and imagination

text: Analytical and problem-solving ability

text: Initiative and independence

text: Honesty and integrity

name: essay6
text: Additional information and comments about the applicant.

name: recommendation
text: I therefore ____ the applicant for admission to the National Graduate School of Engineering in UP Diliman.
